import React, {'{'} useState, useEffect {'}'} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; // import './Cart.css'; // File CSS cho giao din gi hng import {'{'} useNavigate {'}'} from "react-router-dom"; function Cart() {'{'} const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [itemCount, setItemCount] = useState(0); useEffect(() => {'{'} // Ly thng tin gi hng t server khi component c render axios.get('/getAllCart') .then((response) => {'{'} setCartItems(response.data); // console.log('hshsh',response) setItemCount(response.data.length); // Cp nht s lng sn phm {'}'}) .catch((error) => {'{'} console.error('Error fetching cart:', error); {'}'}); {'}'}, [itemCount]); // console.log('cartitem',cartItems) const removeFromCart = (courseId) => {'{'} // X l logic xo sn phm khi gi hng axios.delete(`/cart/${'{'}courseId{'}'}`) .then((response) => {'{'} console.log(response.data.message); // Cp nht li danh sch gi hng sau khi xo // const updatedCart = cartItems.filter(item => item.courseId !== courseId); // setCartItems(updatedCart); // updateItemCount(); // navigate("/"); updateItemCount(); toast.success("Deleted successful"); {'}'}) .catch((error) => {'{'} console.error('Error removing product from cart:', error); {'}'}); {'}'}; const updateItemCount = () => {'{'} setItemCount(itemCount - 1); // Gim s lng sn phm sau khi xa thnh cng {'}'}; return (
